logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

class HTML5Writer(HTMLWriter):
    """
    A custom HTML5 writer for Sphinx.
    """

    def __init__(self, builder):
        # type: (Any) -> None
        super().__init__(builder)
        self.builder = builder

    def translate(self):
        # type: () -> None
        self.document = self.builder.env.get_and_resolve_doctree(
            self.builder.current_docname, self.builder)
        self.visit_document(self.document)
        self.document.walkabout(self)
        self.depart_document(self.document)
